price: 26. Kaadu Nabii Nuuc: yi Rabbow baaxô bagul koroosite marak inkittuy mutuccu iyya macabin iyye.
arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla nūḥun rabbi lā tadhar ʿalā al-arḍi mina al-kāfirīna dayyāran
